departureFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Thane
departureFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus, Cst, India

returnFlight.from: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus, Cst, India
returnFlight.to: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, Thane

localTransport.details: Utilize Mumbai's extensive local train network or opt for taxis/auto-rickshaws for shorter distances. Download ride-sharing apps for convenience.

accommodation.name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai
accommodation.address: Apollo Bunder, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

activities.title: Arrival at CST & Hotel Check-in
activities.description: Arrive at Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus. Take a pre-booked taxi/local train to The Taj Mahal Palace. Check in and freshen up.
activities.location: Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus to The Taj Mahal Palace

activities.title: Gateway of India Visit
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gateway of India, a historical monument overlooking the Arabian Sea.

sustainableAlternative.title: Walking Tour of Colaba
sustainableAlternative.description: Explore the Colaba area on foot with a local guide, learning about its history and culture while reducing carbon emissions.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local guides and reduces reliance on motorized transport.

activities.title: Dinner at Leopold Cafe
activities.description: Enjoy dinner at Leopold Cafe, a historic restaurant known for its ambiance and diverse menu.

sustainableAlternative.title: Dinner at Local Family Restaurant
sustainableAlternative.description: Dine at a family-owned restaurant that sources ingredients locally and supports the community
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Reduces waste from commercial establishments and supports local economy

activities.title: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus Tour
activities.description: Explore the magnificent Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST), a UNESCO World Heritage Site, known for its Victorian Gothic architecture.

activities.title: Visit Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Mumbai City Museum
activities.description: Visit Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Mumbai City Museum to learn about the history and culture of Mumbai.
activities.location: Dr. Bhau Daji Lad Mumbai City Museum

sustainableAlternative.title: Visit Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum
sustainableAlternative.description: Visit Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum and learn about Mahatma Gandhi's life and work.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Learn more about sustainable and simple living, and reduce your carbon footprint while visiting.

activities.title: Lunch at Britannia & Co.
activities.description: Enjoy lunch at Britannia & Co., a legendary Parsi restaurant known for its berry pulav.

sustainableAlternative.title: Lunch at a Community Kitchen
sustainableAlternative.description: Have lunch at a community kitchen, where meals are prepared with locally sourced ingredients and promote sustainable practices.
sustainableAlternative.ecoImpact: Supports local farmers, reduces food waste, and promotes a sense of community.

activities.title: Departure from Mumbai
activities.description: Depart from Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus for your return journey.
